title: Nutella Hazelnut Ice Cream - Beat the Heat | Eggless - Without Ice Cream Maker

steps.text: In a pan, add the hazelnuts and in med flame slightly roast them just until you see some shine and fat in them. Transfer to a bowl.
In a mixing bowl, add the whipping cream and whip it till stiff peaks. Add the sugar and beat well. Add the condensed milk and milk powder and mix well.
Now add the milk and mix well.
Nutella goes next, after mixing well chop the hazelnuts and pop them in the mix.
Transfer the mix to the freezer and scoop once its frozen. 5-6 hours is fine.

content:
Hie Foodies,

Whether its in a slice of bread or over a paratha or in cupcakes, or just straight from the jar in a spoon or any form.. Its your favorite right?



Smooth, Creamy, Luscious Hazelnut Butter or Nutella is one of the most relished spreads worldwide.. That's sensational! Well, in a ice cream it'll be top notch isn't it? Oh yeah! Here I bring my Extremely Creamy like Soft Serve kind of gooey Nutella Hazelnut Ice Cream which also has crunch from hazelnuts! I <3 that :D I can eat a whole liter of ice cream at once, LOL! Let's Beat the Heat!






Can you resist? I cant obviously! Let me straight go back in the freezer to see if any is left, till then watch my video recipe ;)



Well, That's it for today.. Just one more day left for our Beat the Heat Week :( Don't worry, Loads more summer specials coming this month :)
